parameters.name: pipeline
parameters.label: Dataflow pipeline name
parameters.helpText: Name of the dataflow pipeline to run.

parameters.name: state_code
parameters.label: State code
parameters.helpText: State that the pipeline is running for.

parameters.name: output_sandbox_prefix
parameters.label: Output sandbox prefix
parameters.helpText: If specified, this prefix will be applied to the name of all output datasets for this pipeline.

parameters.name: sandbox_username
parameters.label: Sandbox username
parameters.helpText: The git username for the user running this sandbox pipeline, if applicable.

parameters.name: input_dataset_overrides_json
parameters.label: A map of default dataset to overrides for that dataset
parameters.helpText: When specified, the datasets in the keys of this JSON dict will be replaced with the corresponding value when reading inputs for this pipeline.

parameters.name: raw_data_source_instance
parameters.label: Raw data source instance
parameters.helpText: The raw data instance to read data from. Defaults to PRIMARY. Must have a output_sandbox_prefix set if this value is SECONDARY.

parameters.name: raw_data_upper_bound_dates_json
parameters.label: A comma-separated list of raw file tags to dates to use as upper bounds for raw data.
parameters.helpText: The pipeline will use the dates specified as upper bounds for each raw data table.

parameters.name: ingest_view_results_only
parameters.label: If set to true, only run the pipeline to output ingest view results only to BigQuery.
parameters.helpText: If set to true, only run the pipeline to output ingest view results only to BigQuery.

parameters.name: pre_normalization_only
parameters.label: If set to true, only run the pipeline through ingest view and mapping steps but do not run normalization.
parameters.helpText: If set to true, only run the pipeline through ingest view and mapping steps but do not run normalization.

parameters.name: run_normalization_override
parameters.label: Run normalization override
parameters.helpText: If set to true, will run normalization logic and write output to the {output_sandbox_prefix}_us_xx_normalized_state dataset even if combined ingest and normalization pipelines aren't launched in this state.

parameters.name: ingest_views_to_run
parameters.label: If set as a space-separated string, only run the pipeline for a subset of ingest views.
parameters.helpText: If set as a space-separated string, only run the pipeline for a subset of ingest views.
